scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix user_identity_service" "npm run dev --prefix playlist_service" "npm run dev --prefix api_gateway" "npm run dev --prefix song_service"
scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm i --prefix user_identity_service" "npm i --prefix playlist_service" "npm i --prefix api_gateway" "npm i --prefix song_service"
